Headline: Harlem-bound Green and Kimball-bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green and Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier sick customer at Clark/Lake. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green and Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier sick customer at Clark/Lake.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
